title: American Sustainable Business Network (ASBN)
description: Held Nov. 30 – Dec. 3rd in San Diego – Change-makers across sectors gathered to inform, connect, and mobile business leaders, investors, and policy makers to transform public and private sectors toward a sustainable economy that is stakeholder driven, regenerative, just, and prosperous. Held in late November into early December in San Diego, Green Century VP of Business Development Erin Gray spoke on panels with leaders from the regenerative and black farming community, state legislators, and green technology field discussing Green Century’s sustainable agriculture shareholder advocacy engagements and perspectives on supporting, protecting, and advancing ESG and sustainable investing.
